document.full_text: former bonanno crime family boss joseph massino testified in a brooklyn courtroom on tuesday how he secretly taped his successor discussing murder, the first time a boss has taken the witness stand against an underling, prosecutors said.
document.title: mob boss testifies against underling in brooklyn court
lines_and_colors: former bonanno crime family boss joseph massino testified in a brooklyn courtroom on tuesday how he secretly taped his successor discussing murder, the first time a boss has taken the witness stand against an underling, prosecutors said.
